Line 79: Line 79:
The official remix album for ''Screamworks'', [[SWRMXS]], featuring songs from ''Screamworks'' as remixed by artists such as Tiesto, Morgan Page, and Gavin Russom, was released on December 7, 2010. The album is available online on iTunes, Beatport and other digital retailers, but the physical album is available exclusively at Hot Topic stores in the US. A Special Edition of the album including a new HIM shirt featuring the new album cover was available for pre-order.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.heartagram.com/news/2010/11/01/swrmxs-official-screamworks-remix-album#comments |title=Heartagram.com |publisher=Heartagram.com |date= |accessdate=2011-07-19}}</ref>
The official remix album for ''Screamworks'', [[SWRMXS]], featuring songs from ''Screamworks'' as remixed by artists such as Tiesto, Morgan Page, and Gavin Russom, was released on December 7, 2010. The album is available online on iTunes, Beatport and other digital retailers, but the physical album is available exclusively at Hot Topic stores in the US. A Special Edition of the album including a new HIM shirt featuring the new album cover was available for pre-order.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.heartagram.com/news/2010/11/01/swrmxs-official-screamworks-remix-album#comments |title=Heartagram.com |publisher=Heartagram.com |date= |accessdate=2011-07-19}}</ref>
  +   +
===Until Love Do Us Part (2011- Present)===
  +
As of March 28, 2011 HIM and Sire/Warner records have parted ways. HIMâs manager, Seppo, assures fans that the band is still alive and well and stated that details on future plans as well as a possible new label will be announced in the summer of 2011.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.heartagram.com/news/2011/03/28/him-part-ways-sirewarner-music |title=Heartagram.com |publisher=Heartagram.com |date= |accessdate=2011-07-19}}</ref>
  +   +
On September 13, 2011, HIM announced that they are currently working on a follow-up to 2010's Screamworks: Love in Theory and Practice.
  +   +   +
As of September 23, 2011, HIM announces that the name of their new album to be released in 2012 is "Until Love do us Part", Under permissions of 'Jimmy Franks Recording Company' <ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.roadrunnerrecords.com/blabbermouth.net/news.aspx?mode=Article&newsitemID=163193}}</ref>
